title: [BUG] Sudden increase in disk usage in 3.119.2
body:
### Description

Apologies if this has been covered elsewhere, but some of the native assets for 3.119.2 take up considerably more space than 3.119.1

|Platform|3.199.1 (kb)|3.199.2 (kb)|
|-|-|-|
|Win32|13,051|75,014|
|Linux|39,466|53,908|
|MacOS|6,934|6,934|



### Code

Whatever change happened seemed to land before preview 1

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)

3.116.0 (Current)

### IDE / Editor
